title: 2D Animation Supervisor, CG Studio
summary: Marcom’s Computer Graphics (CG) Studio team is looking for a 2D Animation Supervisor to join our team. In this role, you will be creatively leading animators and designers in crafting outstanding animation and motion graphics for a wide range of projects.
description: As a 2D animation supervisor, this role will guide animators on solving technical and creative challenges. Oversee daily reviews of work with internal teams, ensuring alignment with creative directions.
key_qualifications: Experience supervising production and artists on animation and motion graphics projects, Proficiency in key tools including, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, Cinema 4D and utilize them to craft animation and design work
preferred_qualifications: Deep understanding of animation and design principles. Excellent design skills, a creative eye with a sensibility for composition, light, color, and strong attention to detail
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $170,100 and $255,700, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs.
